resources.string: BYE, BYE! Thanks for using AceB FORTH.
You can exit from here by selecting OK or Cancel to continue working in AceB.
There was an unexpected problem with input or output. Ignore it?
You can use Cancel to stop the program, or OK to simulate the end of input or success of output.
Help can be displayed by pressing the help button in a dialog, and the OK and Cancel buttons still function the same.
